com.ibm.struts.taglib.html
Class FileTag

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.struts.taglib.html.FileTag
      com.ibm.struts.taglib.html.FileTag

public class FileTag
extends org.apache.struts.taglib.html.FileTag

This class is a simple extension of the Struts file tag to adding the dir attribute.

Since:
5.1
